body:
fresh checkout of spack, slepc specs cannot be satisfied.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack mirror create -D -d . dealii@develop
```

### Error Message

```console
==> Error: Conflicting conditional dependencies onpackage slepc for spec slepc@3.10.1+arpack~blopex ^blas ^bzip2 ^diffutils ^gdbm ^lapack ^ncurses ^openssl ^perl@5.14.0: ^petsc@3.10:3.10.99 ^pkgconfig ^python@2.6:2.8 ^readline ^sqlite ^zlib
...
```

I get the same error for many different version specification.
title: slepc spec not satisfied when creating a mirror for dealii
